root.name: Octodad: Dadliest Catch
root.description: System RequirementsPCMinimumOS: Windows XP SP3Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4Ghz or equivalentMemory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: Intel Core HD Graphics (3000/4000), NVIDIA 8800 GT, ATI 4850 or betterDirectX: Version 9.0Hard Drive: 2 GB available spaceSound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound cardRecommendedOS: Windows 7, Windows 8Processor: Intel Core i5 2.8Ghz or equivalentMemory: 4 GB RAMGraphics: Midrange NVIDIA GeForce 400 / AMD Radeon HD 5000 or betterDirectX: Version 9.0Hard Drive: 2 GB available spaceSound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound cardMacMinimumOS: Snow Leopard 10.6 or newerProcessor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8Ghz or equivalentMemory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: Shader Model 3.0 capable cardHard Drive: 2 GB available spaceLinuxMinimumOS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer, other unsupported distros may workProcessor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8Ghz or equivalentMemory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: Shader Model 3.0 capable cardHard Drive: 2 GB available space
